##3.2 Model 2: including directly with contraceptive method associated predictors

DURATION and satisfaction!

```{r}
sa_m2 <- glmer(switch ~ contra_satis + contra_duration +  contra_satis * contra_duration + (1 + hc | CASEID), family = binomial, data = Fake_cccu_SA)

summary(sa_m2)
confint(sa_m2)
```
